item.title: Keith and Bill-O on the Small Screen
item.description:
The ongoing, very public disagreement between news anchors Keith Olbermann and Bill O’Reilly is a must-watch for many, with Olbermann leaning left and O’Reilly leaning right. Now, you don’t have to miss a moment of their debates, or any other news for that matter. MediaFLO USA is introducing three 24/7 news channels to its mobile TV lineup: MSNBC, CNBC, and FOX News, all accessible on your compatible cell phone. Anyone who regularly watches these major news channels on cable or satellite understands the feeling of missing out when away from home, especially during major events or when your favorite show is airing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/keith-and-bill-o-on-the-small-screen/

item.title: 700 MHz Groundhogs Look For DTV Shadow
item.description:
Every year, like clockwork, attention turns to predicting the future, and this year is no different. While many await a groundhog’s weather forecast, the telecom industry is focused on a different kind of prediction: the upcoming decision on user rights within the 700 MHz UHF TV band. This decision has significant implications for the future of television broadcasting. One outcome ushers in the era of digital television (DTV), while the other prolongs the use of analog television (ATV) for another 16 weeks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/700-mhz-groundhogs-look-for-dtv-shadow/

item.title: Media Flos to Mobile TV
item.description:
Television is everywhere. While it started with over-the-air broadcasts, it quickly spread to cable, satellite, and the internet through platforms like YouTube and IPTV. Now, mobile devices like cell phones are the new frontier for watching TV on the go. Early mobile video relied on downloadable clips using cellular broadband networks like EV-DO. However, these networks struggle with bandwidth limitations, making it difficult to deliver high-quality real-time video without overloading the system...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/media-flos-to-mobile-tv/
